page.title: 14St. William's Guides in Ince
page.content: The 12th Ince Guide Company meets every Tuesday in St. William's school. They meet from 7.00 to 9.00pm. Miss Southern is the Leader helped by Mrs Halsall. Their activities include singing, doll making, story writing and games. Girls aged 10-14 are able to join the Guides. Afterwards they can go on to be Ranger Guides until they are 18. All guides wear a blue uniform but each Group has a different coloured scarf. St. William's scarf is red. One of the guides' favourite outdoor activities is camping. They have to put up their own tents and do jobs such as peeling pot- atoes, helping to cook meals and keep- ing everything tidy. At night they gather round the camp fire singing songs. The guides usually go on two or three weekend camps each year but in summer they sometimes go for a week. Camping is always popular.
